page.title: 14A Health Visitor in Dunton.
page.content: Dunton being a village, it has a mobile clinic to bring the services of a doctor and health visitor to Dunton once a month. They spend one hour in Church Street and see on average 8 or 9 families. The Health Visitor, Mrs. S. Sylvester, is responsible for visiting Dunton play-group and primary school. In the last year she has looked after 15 new born babies. Mrs Sylvester aims to maintain the physical, mental and social well being of the villagers. She can be contacted in her office during the day.
